data.title: Trump announces US withdrawal from UN Human Rights Council
data.description: US President Trump signed an executive order announcing the US withdrawal from the UN Human Rights Council and the UN Relief and Works Agency for the Near East (UNRWA). (Jinshi)

data.title: SEC Launches New Crypto Task Force Website to “Provide Clarity on Crypto Regulation”
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: The U.S. SEC launched a new cryptocurrency task force website to "provide clarity on crypto regulations."

data.title: Crypto Czar David Sacks: Researching the feasibility of Bitcoin reserves
data.description: Crypto czar David Sacks said he is studying the feasibility of Bitcoin reserves. (Jinshi)

data.title: Chairman of the U.S. House Financial Services Committee: Both Houses of Congress will establish a cryptocurrency working group
data.description: French Hill, chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Services Committee, said that both houses of Congress will set up cryptocurrency working groups. (Jinshi)

data.title: Indian Government Slaps 70% Taxes on Unreported Crypto Gains in New Amendment
data.description:
Crypto traders in India could end up shelling out significant tax penalties if they don’t report their gains in a timely fashion. New legislation in the country of 1.46 billion people proposes that reporting entities must submit information regarding crypto transactions to India’s tax authority. Gains that are reported late could garner significant tax penalties. […]
The post Indian Government...
source: https://dailyhodl.com/2025/02/04/indian-government-slaps-70-taxes-on-unreported-crypto-gains-in-new-amendment/

data.title: David Sacks: Will promote regulation to ensure innovation in the crypto space happens in the United States
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News David Sack, the White House AI and cryptocurrency director appointed by Trump, said at the press conference: In the past period of time, I have discussed with many founders of crypto companies. They all said that the industry needs clear supervision. In the past, the SEC's practices forced many crypto companies to leave the United States. In the future, we must ensure that innovation in the crypto field occurs in the United States and has clearer supervision, because offshore companies will bring greater risks, such as FTX's headquarters in the Bahamas.
David Sacks also said that stablecoins are a top priority and can ensure the status of the US dollar.
